content.prompt: The style and iconographic details of the eighteenth-century work shown suggest that its content is most likely

choices.label: a decorative interpretation of love that references Byzantine art
an exhortation to viewers to adhere to virtuous expectations
a comment on the hypocrisy of those who marry without love
a representation of love in the context of aristocratic culture

topic.text: 4.2: Purpose and Audience in Later European and American Art

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Describe visual elements of a work of art (or group of related works of art) beyond the image set, including-  a. form.  b.  Style.  c. materials.  d. technique.  e. content.
